help-file.title: SHIP_COMMANDS DISEMBARK REPAIR RELOAD
help-file.content:
Key to symbols: {} One time only parameter [] Optional parameter <> Required parameter * Number <D> Direction <F/R/P/S> Required parameter, Ship location (Fore/Rear/Port/Starboard)
Commands at a Dock (Most of these only at a Main dock) --------------------------------------------------------------------------- List List Cargo Summon Ship -only main docks in a ZONE Buy <*> {Name in ANSI} -for buying ship or upgrading ship Buy Sail <*> Buy Weapon <*> <F/R/P/S> Buy Cargo <*> Sell Cargo Repair <armor/internal/sail/weapon> <F/R/P/S/All> Reload <Weapon */All> Enter *.ship -or-Enter <owner name> -or-Enter *.<shiptype>
Commands on a Ship --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Order Undock Order Maneuver <D> Order Heading <*> or <D> -* is an angle measured clockwise from north Order Speed <*> Order Anchor Order Ram
Look Out Look Tactical [X] [Y] Look Cargo Look Status / Look Ship Look Weaponspec Look Sight <Weapon *> Look Contacts Look Crew
Lock <ID> Lock off Scan <ID> Fire <Weapon *> Frag Ship Get Money Disembark -only from the edge of a ship for large ships
